Add On Bags

Our Add-on Bag is a heavy-duty luggage piece that helps you organize and carry your additional products and supplies. You can carry additional products when needed and keep them organized and protected when you don't. Its design allows for being stacked on top of most rolling bags with a telescoping handle. Using it with our Sales Bag is a popular and great alternative to buying one of our oversized bags. We offer the bag with or without our wheel system. Both the wheeled and no-wheeled versions come with the ability to be stacked on a larger wheeled bag.

CUSTOM BAG FEATURES:

  • Embroidery options for up to 2 sides of the bag
  • Interior foam padding and exterior hard plastic to protect your equipment
  • Commercial grade materials
  • 9 zipper pockets for literature and product storage
  • 2 large pouch pockets on each side for additional device storageâ€¨
  • Our Watts Bags exclusive wheel system
  • Customizable interior with removable/adjustable divider system
  • Slip-on back in order to be piggybacked on any bag with a telescoping handle
  • Divider system to transform bag into a laptop workstation
  • Removable shoulder strap with foam pad

Add-On Bag without Wheels

  • Rigid Weight: 6.4 pounds
  • Lightened Weight: 5.5 pounds
  • Loaded Dimensions: 12" Deep x 12" Wide x 21" Long
  • Internal Dimensions: 10" Deep x 10.5" Wide x 15" Long

  • Watts Wheel System: Yes
